did.unittitle: Petition for an academy at Oyster Bay
did.abstract: A handwritten copy of the names of the signers of an 1803 petition for an academy in Oyster Bay, Long Island, N.Y.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Petition for an academy at Oyster Bay, 1803, 1977.644, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A handwritten copy of the names of the signers of a petition for an academy in Oyster Bay, Long Island, N.Y. The top of the petition states, "Charter dated March 15, 1803." The creator of this document is unknown.
